hero.title: Outdoorsy — SXSW Creative Brief
hero.dek: Native Rodeo brief (not embedded). Source HTML was used only as a style reference.

mustInclude.notes: ATX is acceptable; if you need the long form, use Austin, TX. Keep type bold + readable for screenprint/embroidery.

items.title: Route Marker
items.caption: ATX shield + RV silhouette + Texas star. Text: Outdoorsy + SXSW.

items.title: Guitar Pick
items.caption: SXSW music nod, road leading to RV. Text includes ATX.

items.title: Map Pin
items.caption: Campsite scene inside pin. Text: Outdoorsy + SXSW + ATX.

shortlist.recommend: Route Marker "ATX" — strongest silhouette + instant Austin read + easiest to tighten into a final mark.
shortlist.alsoStrong: Guitar Pick + Road — SXSW nod that doesn’t feel corporate; good sticker energy.
shortlist.wildcard: Map Pin Campsite — most logo-like and scalable, but can get busy if details creep in.

directions.title: Direction A — Route Marker "ATX"
directions.tag: Austin highway badge + RV silhouette + Texas star
directions.why: Instant recognizability. Looks like merch you’d buy even if you weren’t on the team.
directions.refine: Lock type hierarchy (Outdoorsy primary), pick 1 star placement, simplify RV shape.

directions.title: Direction B — Guitar Pick + Road
directions.why: Feels festival-native. The road-to-SXSW story is built-in.
directions.refine: Reduce internal detail; keep road bold and RV super simple so it holds on hats.

directions.title: Direction C — Map Pin Campsite
directions.why: Most scalable mark option; can live beyond SXSW if we drop the event text.
directions.refine: One interior motif only (RV OR campsite). Avoid tiny trees/lines.

notes: Text must include: Outdoorsy + SXSW + ATX (or Austin, TX depending on direction).
Keep a 1–3 color version as the core. No gradients.
Next step: pick a winning direction, then generate 6–10 tighter variations.
